question: What is SolarDust?
answer: This is a collectible card NFT game. In it, you can not just collect cards, but play and win cryptocurrency.Solar Dust is play to earn tactical card game built on the Solana Blockchain that gives players true ownership of their in-game items. With its own exiting metaverse, where you can raise your own character and take part in battles for the most valuable resource in the universe that gives incredible strength, wealth and power to its owner - SolarDust.

question: So this game uses NFTs… what are those, anyway?
answer: NFTs are unique tokens that have verifiable on-chain proof of ownership and verification. Anyone can verify the authenticity of an official asset on chain. Copies cannot be used in game and can easily be debunked as a copy. Some newcomers think you can screenshot an NFT and own it but that is hilariously not the case. If you photocopy a very rare pokemon, MTG or baseball card and try to sell it on ebay you won’t get 6 figures, because it’s obviously a fake. With NFTs, the on chain data is proof of authenticity & legitimacy.

question: What types of NFTs will Solar Dust have?
answer:
Our first randomized NFT collection will contain 10,000 unique elven heroes avatars with different rarity — your exclusive ticket into the greater SolarDust Metaverse.
Afterwards you will be able to raise your own battle squad, with many different races and classes NFT cards warriors that inhabit the metaverse.
